scenes.description: MC section in a karaoke-themed room. Elizabeth reflects on her performance and receives a call from Kureiji Ollie.

subtitles.original: Heaven, please sing for me a song of light
subtitles.english: Heaven, please sing for me a song of light

subtitles.original: Heaven, save me and my dreams tonight
subtitles.english: Heaven, save me and my dreams tonight

subtitles.original: Someday these wings will perish in your sight
subtitles.english: Someday these wings will perish in your sight

subtitles.original: Night and day I call for you
subtitles.english: Night and day I call for you

subtitles.original: Flashes of moments so tragic
subtitles.english: Flashes of moments so tragic

subtitles.original: Wandering souls they fall along the way
subtitles.english: Wandering souls they fall along the way

subtitles.original: Tell me you will never leave me forever and ever
subtitles.english: Tell me you will never leave me forever and ever

subtitles.original: I gotta be I gotta be in your arms hear me
subtitles.english: I gotta be I gotta be in your arms hear me

subtitles.original: So close, so close
subtitles.english: So close, so close

subtitles.original: And it's you that I believe in, I believe in
subtitles.english: And it's you that I believe in, I believe in

subtitles.original: So close, but far away I seek for your light
subtitles.english: So close, but far away I seek for your light

subtitles.original: I'll hold on 'cause for you my heart keeps beating
subtitles.english: I'll hold on 'cause for you my heart keeps beating

subtitles.original: When the wind, the fire and all is gone
subtitles.english: When the wind, the fire and all is gone

subtitles.original: Caress me with your sweet lullaby
subtitles.english: Caress me with your sweet lullaby

subtitles.original: Will you be my light? Will you be my strength?
subtitles.english: Will you be my light? Will you be my strength?

subtitles.original: Promise you won't let me go
subtitles.english: Promise you won't let me go

subtitles.original: I'll never betray in the end of time
subtitles.english: I'll never betray in the end of time

subtitles.original: Still my love's gonna be there
subtitles.english: Still my love's gonna be there

subtitles.original: So close, so close
subtitles.english: So close, so close

subtitles.original: And it's you that I believe in, I believe in
subtitles.english: And it's you that I believe in, I believe in

subtitles.original: So close, but far away, so far I can't touch
subtitles.english: So close, but far away, so far I can't touch

subtitles.original: I'll hold on 'cause it's you I love so dearly
subtitles.english: I'll hold on 'cause it's you I love so dearly

subtitles.original: When the rain, the storm and all is gone

subtitles.english: Caress me with your sweet lullaby

subtitles.english: And it's you that I believe in, I believe in

subtitles.original: So close, but far away I seek for your light
subtitles.english: So close, but far away I seek for your light

subtitles.original: I'll hold on 'cause for you my heart keeps beating
subtitles.english: I'll hold on 'cause for you my heart keeps beating

subtitles.original: When the wind, the fire and all is gone
subtitles.english: When the wind, the fire and all is gone

subtitles.original: Caress me with your sweet lullaby
subtitles.english: Caress me with your sweet lullaby

subtitles.original: Hmm... well...
subtitles.english: Hmm... well...

subtitles.original: This song is lovely,
subtitles.english: This song is lovely,

subtitles.original: but for my showcase performance, should I pick nostalgic songs?
subtitles.english: but for my showcase performance, should I pick nostalgic songs?

subtitles.original: Hmm...
subtitles.english: Hmm...

subtitles.original: Oh, it's a call!
subtitles.english: Oh, it's a call!

subtitles.original: Bleeh! My favorite kohai!
subtitles.english: Bleeh! My favorite kohai!

subtitles.original: How are you, Bibi?
subtitles.english: How are you, Bibi?

subtitles.original: Ollie-senpai! Perfect timing.
subtitles.english: Ollie-senpai! Perfect timing.

subtitles.original: Actually, I'm having trouble deciding what to sing for my 3D showcase.
subtitles.english: Actually, I'm having trouble deciding what to sing for my 3D showcase.

subtitles.original: Yeah...
subtitles.english: Yeah...

subtitles.original: Is that so?
subtitles.english: Is that so?

subtitles.original: Though I think I speak for everyone when I say,
subtitles.english: Though I think I speak for everyone when I say,

subtitles.original: "We'll be happy to hear you sing anything!"
subtitles.english: "We'll be happy to hear you sing anything!"

subtitles.original: As long as you're enjoying yourself, that is.
subtitles.english: As long as you're enjoying yourself, that is.

subtitles.original: Yeah, but...
subtitles.english: Yeah, but...

subtitles.original: Isn't it standard to pick songs that match your image?
subtitles.english: Isn't it standard to pick songs that match your image?

subtitles.original: There's an expectation to be cool, right?
subtitles.english: There's an expectation to be cool, right?

subtitles.original: But since this is a special occasion and all, I was thinking maybe I should show other sides of myself.
subtitles.english: But since this is a special occasion and all, I was thinking maybe I should show other sides of myself.

subtitles.original: Hmm, I see.
subtitles.english: Hmm, I see.

subtitles.original: Well, you know how powerful you look when you sing?
subtitles.english: Well, you know how powerful you look when you sing?

subtitles.original: Yes, yes.
subtitles.english: Yes, yes.

subtitles.original: So I thought, you know...
subtitles.english: So I thought, you know...

subtitles.original: Why not try a cute song instead?
subtitles.english: Why not try a cute song instead?

subtitles.original: Go for that gap moe appeal, you know what I'm saying?
subtitles.english: Go for that gap moe appeal, you know what I'm saying?

subtitles.original: Cute song... that would be different from usual, which would be good,
subtitles.english: Cute song... that would be different from usual, which would be good,

subtitles.original: but I'm a bit worried about doing it alone. Hmm...
subtitles.english: but I'm a bit worried about doing it alone. Hmm...

subtitles.original: Ah! That's it!
subtitles.english: Ah! That's it!

subtitles.original: What if we invited my brothers-in-arms, ARMIS as guests?
subtitles.english: What if we invited my brothers-in-arms, ARMIS as guests?

subtitles.original: That's a great idea!
subtitles.english: That's a great idea!

subtitles.original: Seeing cool people singing cute songs...
subtitles.english: Seeing cool people singing cute songs...

subtitles.original: Oh, the gap moe will definitely get everybody excited!
subtitles.english: Oh, the gap moe will definitely get everybody excited!

subtitles.original: But... it's still a tad embarrassing.
subtitles.english: But... it's still a tad embarrassing.

subtitles.original: It'll be fine!
subtitles.english: It'll be fine!

subtitles.original: Come on, try imagining it.
subtitles.english: Come on, try imagining it.

subtitles.original: Picture you and ARMIS singing a cute song together!
subtitles.english: Picture you and ARMIS singing a cute song together!

subtitles.original: Okay... me and ARMIS...
subtitles.english: Okay... me and ARMIS...

subtitles.original: Cute song...
subtitles.english: Cute song...

subtitles.original: ...together!
subtitles.english: ...together!
